name: Button Bugs (Android)
description:
Work In Progress

Your place is riddled with button bugs!

Squish those bugs by clicking on the two buttons in the colour order of bug segments, from head to tail.

Watch out, if the bugs hit the buttons, they'll grow. If the buttons touch they'll explode and the game is over.

Slide your fingers around the screen to rotate the buttons out of the way of the bug heads.

Splash screen artwork by Mushbuh

Thanks @rogueNoodle for feedback
